meta-review.comment: Lightyear Frontier offers a delightful mix of farming, crafting, and exploration with a touch of sci-fi, all wrapped up in a big ol' stompy robot suit. While the early access version may feel a bit slow at times and lacks a fully developed story, the game's charming world and nature-focused gameplay shine. The seamless multiplayer function also adds to the relaxing experience, making it a great choice for unwinding after a stressful day.
